commits.message:
Maintenance-mode bug-fixing.

- [NC] Don't automatically clean up instance if libvirt domain lookup
       fails--may be a migration anomaly.
- [NC] Track active outgoing-migration count, don't rollback timed-out
       migration preparations if they're being blocked due to an active
       migration.
- [NC] Don't deauthorize client credentials on migration destination
       if there are still pending (but not yet active) migrations.
- [NC] Don't blank migration src & dst information in instance struct
       on source when rolling back; the information is useful elsewhere.
- [NC] Refactor migration key generation into separate function.
- [NC] Verify in-progress migration counter when refreshing instance
       info.
- [NC] Don't time out preparing migrations when other outgoing
       migrations are in progress.
- [NC] Don't regenerate migration credentials when unchanged from
       previously used credentials (i.e. part of a multi-instance
       migration).
- Ignore Emacs auto-save files.

Progress toward EUCA-6024, EUCA-6030.
